text: Eric Horgan (born 27 August 1947) is an Irish equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Irish male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Ireland Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Eric Horgan
